articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum delayed again, precious
articles.description: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum will no longer come out Sept. 1 — instead, the game has been delayed a few months. An exact release date has yet to be announced.
articles.content: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum, the upcoming Lord of the Rings game focused on you guessed it Gollum, has been delayed again. The message on the official Twitter stated that the games release has been… [+770 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Apex Legends’ new legend Vantage, Hunted update release date announced
articles.description: Respawn Entertainment revealed Apex Legends’ newest character, Vantage (and her pet bat Echo), in an update on the Hunted patch coming to the free-to-play shooter.
articles.content: Vantage and Echo come to Respawns shooter in August

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Halo Infinite won’t have matchmaking for campaign co-op
articles.description: In a statement to GamesRadar, 343 Industries revealed that Halo Infinite players won’t be able to find random friends to play campaign co-op with through online matchmaking.
articles.content: Halo Infinites campaign multiplayer beta test is currently live, giving players the chance to squad up in one of last years best games. However, those looking to find a group of friends to play with … [+1548 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Avengers: Secret Wars, Kang Dynasty won’t bring back the Russo brothers
articles.description: Marvel Studios president Kevin Feige says the brother director duo of Joe and Anthony Russo won’t direct Marvel’s Avengers: The Kang Dynasty or Avengers: Secret Wars.
articles.content: Marvel Studios revealed the next two Avengers moviesAvengers: The Kang Dynasty and Avengers: Secret Wars at its San Diego Comic-Con panel over the weekend. At the same event, Marvel Studios president… [+1321 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Square Enix’s Tactics Ogre remake details, release date leak
articles.description: Tactics Ogre: Reborn, a remake of Let Us Cling Together for Super NES and PSP, is coming to PS4 and PS5 this November, according to leaked details from Sony’s PlayStation Store.
articles.content: Square Enixs (still-unannounced) remake of classic strategy RPG Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together is coming to PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 on Nov. 11, according to leaked details from Sonys Pla… [+1419 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Everything we know about Namor, Black Panther 2’s villain from SDCC 2022
articles.description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’s apparent villain Namor is one of the oldest characters in the whole Marvel universe, which means he’s got plenty of history, even if we don’t know his role in the movie just yet.
articles.content: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever finally has a new trailer and its full of familiar faces and new heroes. But the footage, released during Marvels panel at San Diego Comic-Con 2022, only teased the mov… [+3436 chars]

articles.author: Susana Polo
articles.title: SDCC 2022: Avengers: Secret Wars could give the MCU the power of a reboot
articles.description: Avengers: Secret Wars will help close out Phase 6 — and could give the Marvel Cinematic Universe a reboot, if it wanted one.
articles.content: Marvel Studios has always known how to throw a Hall H party, and though there were worries that the irregular nature of the first in-person San Diego Comic-Con in three years would keep things muted,… [+3147 chars]

articles.title: SDCC 2022: Daredevil arrives in MCU in Disney Plus series Daredevil: Born Again
articles.description: Charlie Cox and Vincent D’Onofrio will return as Daredevil and Kingpin in a new MCU-set series starring The Man Without Fear, Marvel Studios announced in their Hall H panel at SDCC 2022.
articles.content:
After cameos in Spider-Man: No Way Home, Daredevil will once again roam the streets of Hells Kitchen in a new series coming to Disney Plus.
